events.text: [color=#ffed29]("If no progress in the production of [b]Remedium[/b] is made between the first installment and the second, the 25,000 gold coins will not be delivered until [b]Remedium[/b] completes another milestone.")
[color=#ffed29](The second milestone was around 3 months ago.)

[color=#ffed29](...Maybe, that's why people are getting antsy.)
[color=#ffed29](It's because we won't get the second installment of money until we're approved.)
